description.value:
Your professionalism makes people happy to work with you, even outside of your professional capacity.

Benefit: When you use a Profession skill in order to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.bD4kmdFU7wwsenOf#earn-a-living]{earn a living} in a given settlement, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @Check[type:diplomacy] made within the settlement unless the targeted creature or the settlement has some reason to dislike or distrust your profession. At the GMâ€™s discretion, you can use your Profession skill in place of Diplomacy when attempting to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#change-attitude]{change attitude} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C#gather-information]{gather information} if you have worked directly with the target of your check.

modifiers.name: Professional Regard
modifiers.notes: When you use a Profession skill in order to earn a living in a given settlement, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Diplomacy Check made within the settlement unless the targeted creature or the settlement has some reason to dislike or distrust your profession.
